manifest.name: @capacitor/core
manifest.description: Capacitor: Cross-platform apps with JavaScript and the web

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run rollup
scripts.build:nativebridge: tsc native-bridge.ts --target es2017 --moduleResolution node --outDir build && rollup --config rollup.bridge.config.js

manifest.readme:
# Capacitor Core JS

See the [Capacitor website](https://capacitorjs.com) for more information.
